A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Star Wars\, the Last Jedi is a failure: misplaced and unfunny humor that will make the entire room cringe\, characters so shallow and uninteresting that will make you miss JarJar Binks\, questionable choices and actions from every\, and I mean every character that will make you shout at the screen for just how much idiotic everyone seems to be.
Add to that an almost non-existant story and you have a movie that will anger the fans and bore the rest.

Do yourself a favor and don't waste your money to go watch it. Wait until the hype dies off and everyone eventually realizes how much of a disappointment this movie really is.
